definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Fenn was a man who had a big pond of his own.
sentences.chinese: 他夏天卖冰，而水塘就是造冰用的。

sentences.english: Water makes the pond more picturesque.
When she is falling into the pool, a breeze holds her up.
sentences.chinese: 在她掉入水塘时，一阵清风将她盈盈托住。

sentences.english: I hope you jump in rain puddles.
sentences.chinese: 我愿你在雨后水塘里尽情欢跳。

sentences.english: They emerge from the pools in their billions.
sentences.chinese: 难以数计的蚊子从水塘中冒出。

sentences.english: Finally, the third is a big pool with an indispensable view of the sea.
sentences.chinese: 最后是有着大海即视感的大水塘。

sentences.english: A hundred feet ahead, the full moon glistened off the oasis pond.
sentences.chinese: 一百英尺外绿洲的水塘反射着满月的光芒。

sentences.english: Widely distributed in reservoir catchments and upland streams.
sentences.chinese: 广泛分布于水塘集水区和上游溪流。

sentences.english: Once a jolly swagman camped by a billabong.
sentences.chinese: 有个快乐的流浪汉，宿在水塘旁。

sentences.english: About 70% of the North and South Courses turf area return rainfall to the reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 北场和南场大概收集70%降雨量储回于水塘。

sentences.english: In the evenings the drakes cry continually from the pools.
sentences.chinese: 傍晚水塘里的公鸭叫个不停。

sentences.english: The dog soused itself in the pond.
It is surprising that many fingerlings are living in the small rainwater pool.
sentences.chinese: 雨水积成的小水塘里居然生活着不少鱼秧。

sentences.english: In fish in reservoirs, a cutting feed the fish every day.
sentences.chinese: 在水塘里养鱼，每天得割草喂鱼。

sentences.english: In the evening the drake cry continually from the pools.
sentences.chinese: 傍晚水塘里的公鸭叫个不停。

sentences.english: He hid inside a tussock of oat grass and watched as the fine thatched house rose up beside the water-hole.
sentences.chinese: 他眼看着一座宽敞明亮的房子在水塘边上拔地而起。

definition: Yuchi or Yuchih township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
